original_text: Any nation or kingdom that refuses to serve you will come to an end. Enemies will completely destroy those nations. Any nation or kingdom that refuses to serve you
korean_text: 너를 섬기지 아니하는 백성과 나라는 파멸하리니 그 백성들은 반드시 진멸되리라

sentences.original_text: Any nation or kingdom that refuses to serve you
sentences.korean_translation: 너를 섬기기를 거부하는 어떤 나라나 왕국도

sentences.original_text: Enemies will completely destroy those nations
sentences.korean_translation: 원수들이 그 나라들을 완전히 파괴할 것이다

sentences.original_text: Any nation or kingdom that refuses to serve you
sentences.korean_translation: 너를 섬기기를 거부하는 어떤 나라나 왕국도
